opis: Dio kuće, prvi kat i potkrovlje novije gradnje na otoku Šolti u mjestu Maslinica. Površine je 180 m2. Uređeni kao tri apartmana. 2 jednosobna apartmana na prvom katu i jedan dvosobni na drugom s terasom od 20m2 s koje se pruža fenomenalan pogled na more. Uz kuću idu pripadajuća 2 parking mjesta ispred. Kompletno sređeno i opremljeno kvalitetnim namještajem. Oba apartmana na prvom katu su kategorizirana i imaju 4 zvjezdice, apartman u potkrovlju koriste vlasnici, ali i on se može kategorizirati za najam. ------------------------------------ First and second floor of a house are for sale in the island Šolta, Maslinica. The two floors have 180m2. They are arranged as 3 separate apartments. Two one bedroom apartments on the first floor and a two bedroom apartment in the attic with a terrace of 20m2 which has a phenomenal sea view. It comes with two parking spots in front of the house. The apartments are completely decorated and furnished with quality furniture. Both apartments on the first floor are categorized with 4 stars for renting. The apartment on the second floor was used by owners but it can also be categorized for renting.
